digraph {
  graph[
    label = "High level process\n\n"
		labelloc = t
		fontname = "Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif"
		fontsize = 20
		layout = dot
		rankdir = LR
		newrank = true
	];
	node [
  		style = filled
  		shape = rect
  		pencolor = "#00000044" // frames color
  		fontname = "Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif"
  		shape = plaintext
  ];
  
  pre_pd [
    label = "01: Project setup";
  ];
  pd_loop [
    label = "02: Problem definition";
  ];
  analysis_loop [
    label = "03: Analysis and modelling";
  ];
  review [
    label = "04: Initiative review";
  ];

  pre_pd -> pd_loop [ label = "Items created"; ];
  pd_loop -> analysis_loop [ label = "Sign off from customer"; dir=down ];
  analysis_loop -> review [ label = "Work completed" ];
  {
    rank=same;
    pre_pd; review;
  }
  {
    rank=same;
    pd_loop; analysis_loop;
  }
}
